scripts.build:deps: pnpm --filter @carta/domain build && pnpm --filter @carta/document build && pnpm --filter @carta/compiler build && pnpm --filter @carta/server build
scripts.dev: pnpm run build:deps && pnpm run compile && concurrently -k -n vite,tsc-main,tsc-preload,electron -c blue,yellow,yellow,green "pnpm --filter @carta/web-client demo --port 5373" "tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "wait-on http://localhost:5373 && nodemon --watch dist/main --watch dist/preload --ext js --delay 1 --exec 'electron .'"
scripts.dev:electron: pnpm run build:deps && pnpm run compile && electron .
scripts.compile: rm -rf dist/main dist/preload && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json
scripts.build: pnpm --filter @carta/web-client build && pnpm --filter @carta/server build && pnpm run compile && node scripts/copy-renderer.mjs
